# Raft Consensus Algorithm ï¼š åˆ†å¸ƒå¼Raftä¸€è‡´æ€§ç®—æ³•

1. docker-compose.ymlæ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

version: "3.3"
services:
  qingwang-user:
    image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/my-cloud-namespace/qingwang-admin:0.0.3
    environment:
      JAVA_AGENT_OPTS: ""
    deploy:
      replicas: 3
    volumes:
      - /root/mqz/log/qingwang-admin/logs/:/home/mqz/qingwang-user-0.0.1/logs/
    ports:
      - "2000:2000"
    networks:
      - test
    restart: on-failure
networks:
  test:
    external: true
